name: Kanishe Adventures (Demo)
description:
This is the story of the Kanishe Kouleur (Rainbow Poodle in english), kanishe kouleur is a typo of the word Caniche and Couleur wich are french words.

controles:

A/D = move

W = get in doors

SPACE = jump

S = climb down ladders

R = Reload level

ESC = pause the game

Check out our Official Website.

This is just a short 3 levels demo of a simple yet very cool platformer game that i wanted to make for a very small while, please give feedbacks :)

Game credits:

alex135t - main developer

mariiobrosuy - textures

raphodono - ideas
